verses.1: Ta pil in a paʼ hilhna mang a, a kihisak mi in a khial min pua nuam lo hi.
verses.2: Mihoihte in a kam siamna bangun thaman sang a, mizuaute pen siat tat ding bek ut uh hi.
verses.3: Pau a ki-ip zo mi in a nuntakna a hu hi a, a mawk paupau mi pen amah a kisiasak tawm ahi hi.
verses.4: Thadah mi in a deih ngah zo lo a, nasep hahkat mi in a deih khempeuh ngah zo hi.
verses.5: Thuman mi in zuau thu deih lo a, a gilo mi in gensiatna le mindai nading bek a pau hi.
verses.6: Thumanna in midikte hu a, gitlohna pen mawhneiteʼ pukna ahi hi.
verses.7: Mi pawl khatte, zawng napi-in kihausak uh a, mi pawl khatte, hau napi-in kizawngsak uh hi.
verses.8: Mihau paʼ sum hauhna in a nuntakna tan khia zo a, mizawng pa in a kitatna ding bangmah nei lo hi.
verses.9: Thuman mite khuavak bangin taang lela a, migilote meivak bangin mit pak hi.
verses.10: Hilh ding ut lo, kihihsakna in kitotna bek piangsak thei a, hong kithuhilh ding utna pen a hoih zaw ahi hi.
verses.11: Ol takin hauh pakna oltak mahin kiamkik pah a, haksapi-in hauh tohna khangto semsem hi.
verses.12: Lamet tun lohna in lungsim cinasak a, deihna tangtunna pen lungdamna ahi hi.
verses.13: Thu kihilh ding ut lohna pen siat ding utna hi a, thukihilhna zuihna pen lungnopna ahi hi.
verses.14: Mipilteʼ thuhilhna pen nuntakna tuinak bang hi a, sihna thang tawh kipelhna ahi hi.
verses.15: Thungaihsut theihna pen maipha ngahna hi a, zuautatna in lungkhamna bek piangsak hi.
verses.16: Thungaihsun theite pilna tawh gamta a, mihaite in a haina taangko hi.
verses.17: Kamtai gina lo in mi lungkhamsak a, a citak thupuak pa in mi lungdamsakkik hi.
verses.18: Thukihilhna a zui lo mi in zawnna le mindaina ngah a, thukihilhna a zui mi in minphatna le pahtawina a ngah hi.
verses.19: Deihna ngahna in lungsim nuamsak a, siat gamtatna panin mihaite pial khia nuam lo hi.
verses.20: Mipil tawh kikhawl lecin na pil dinga, mihai tawh kikhawl lecin gimna na thuak ding hi.
verses.21: Tuahsiatna in mawhneite sulzuih kawikawi a, midikte tuahpha kawikawi hi.
verses.22: Midikte in a tu a tateʼ luah ding gamh nei uh a, mawhneiteʼ neihsate ahihleh midikte ading hi lel hi.
verses.23: Lo thak panin mizawngteʼ khamkhop ding an piang kha dinga, ahi zongin thuman lohna hangin tua nangawn maimang thei ding hi.
verses.24: A ta a tai nuam lote a ta mudah hi a, a ta a itte in limtakin thuhilhin a tai hi.
verses.25: Thuman mi in a kham ding nei-in gilvah a, a gilo mi in nektawm ding nei loin a gil a kial hi.
